trans-unit.source: The interactive window has already been initialized.
Replace the current submission with a subsequent submission (after having previously navigated backwards).
trans-unit.target: 将当前提交替换为后一个提交(在之前已向后导航之后)。

trans-unit.source: Replace the current submission with a previous submission.
trans-unit.target: 将当前提交替换为前一个提交。

trans-unit.source: Clears the contents of the editor window, leaving history and execution context intact.
trans-unit.target: 清除编辑器窗口中的内容，保留历史记录和执行上下文不变。

trans-unit.source: Command '{0}' failed: {1}
[command-name]
First press, select the submission containing the cursor. Second press, select all text in the window.
trans-unit.target: 第一次按下时，选择包含光标的提交，第二次按下时，选择窗口中的所有文本。

trans-unit.source: Replace the current submission with a subsequent submission beginning with the same text (after having previously navigated backwards).
trans-unit.target: 将当前提交替换为以相同文本开头的后一个提交(在之前已向后导航之后)。

trans-unit.source: Replace the current submission with a previous submission beginning with the same text.
trans-unit.target: 将当前提交替换为以相同文本开头的前一个提交。

trans-unit.source: Paste and execute the selection before any pending input in the interactive buffer.
trans-unit.target: 粘贴选定内容，并在交互式缓冲中任何挂起的输入之前执行。

trans-unit.source: Within the current submission, evaluate the current submission.
trans-unit.target: 在当前提交内，对当前提交求值。

trans-unit.source: Within a previous submission, append the previous submission to the current submission.
trans-unit.target: 在前一个提交内，将前一个提交追加到当前提交。

trans-unit.source: Paste the selection at the end of interactive buffer, leave caret at the end of input.
trans-unit.target: 在交互式缓冲区末尾粘贴选定内容，将插入点置于输入末尾。

trans-unit.source: At the end of the current submission, replace the current submission with a subsequent submission (after having previously navigated backwards).
trans-unit.target: 在当前提交结束时，将当前提交替换为后一个提交(在之前已向后导航之后)。

trans-unit.source: Elsewhere, move the cursor down one line.
trans-unit.target: 在其他位置，将光标移到下一行。

trans-unit.source: A command with the name '{0}' has already been registered.
If the current submission appears to be complete, evaluate it. Otherwise, insert a new line.
trans-unit.target: 如果显示当前提交完成，则对其进行求值。否则，插入新行。

trans-unit.source: Clear the current submission.
Display help on specified command, or all available commands and key bindings if none specified.
trans-unit.target: 显示有关指定命令的帮助，如果未指定，则显示有关所有可用命令和密钥绑定的帮助。

trans-unit.source: An internal error has occurred in the Interactive window. Please restart Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: 交互窗口中发生内部错误。请重启 Visual Studio。

trans-unit.source: Keyboard shortcuts:
The command of type '{0}' has no command names.
The interactive window has not yet been initialized.
The interactive window is resetting.
Parameters:
REPL commands:
This method may not be called on the UI thread (to avoid hangs).
trans-unit.target: 不可以在此 UI 线程上调用此方法 (以避免挂起)。

trans-unit.source: This method may only be called on the UI thread.
trans-unit.target: 只能在此 UI 线程上调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Reset the execution environment to the initial state, keep history.
trans-unit.target: 将执行环境重置为初始状态，保留历史记录。

trans-unit.source: Reset to a clean environment (only mscorlib referenced), do not run initialization script.
trans-unit.target: 重置为干净环境(仅引用 mscorlib)，不要运行初始化脚本。

trans-unit.source: Insert a new line.
Unknown command '{0}'
At the end of the current submission, replace the current submission with a previous submission.
trans-unit.target: 在当前提交结束时，将当前提交替换为前一个提交。

trans-unit.source: Elsewhere, move the cursor up one line.
trans-unit.target: 在其他位置，将光标移到上一行。

trans-unit.source: Usage:
Copy
Generating Rich Text Format representation from selection.
trans-unit.target: 基于选定内容生成 RTF 格式表示形式。

trans-unit.source: Delete Character To Left
Insert New Line
Paste
Cut Selection
Delete Text
Cut Line
Delete Line
Insert Text
Script directives:
Add a metadata reference to specified assembly and all its dependencies, e.g. #r "myLib.dll".
trans-unit.target: 添加对指定程序集及其所有依赖项的元数据引用，例如 #r "myLib.dll"。

trans-unit.source: Load specified script file and execute it, e.g. #load "myScript.csx".
trans-unit.target: 加载指定的脚本文件并执行，例如 #load "myScript.csx"。

trans-unit.source: Interactive Window Error Output
